author: R.Sivaraman
title: Crime drops in city as people stay home
description: Fewer crimes were reported to city police stations between Saturday night and Monday morning as residents stayed at home in view of ‘Janata Curfew’. The curfew was observed in the city which has more
content:
Fewer crimes were reported to city police stations between Saturday night and Monday morning as residents stayed at home in view of Janata Curfew. 
The curfew was observed in the city which has more than a one crore population to contain the spread of COVID-… [+1237 chars]
